get.description: This method gets all the operations.
Lists all the jobs available under the subscription.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on Get list of jobs, which provides the next page in the list of jobs.

200.description: List of jobs available under the subscription.

post.description: This method provides the list of available skus for the given subscription and location.

parameters.name: availableSkuRequest
parameters.description: Filters for showing the available skus.

post.description: This method validates the customer shipping address and provide alternate addresses if any.

get.description: Lists all the jobs available under the given resource group.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on Get list of jobs, which provides the next page in the list of jobs.

200.description: List of jobs by resource group.

get.description: Gets information about the specified job.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: $expand is supported on details parameter for job, which provides details on the job stages.

put.description: Creates a new job with the specified parameters. Existing job cannot be updated with this API and should instead be updated with the Update job API.

patch.description: Updates the properties of an existing job.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The patch will be performed only if the ETag of the job on the server matches this value.

parameters.name: jobResourceUpdateParameter
parameters.description: Job update parameters from request body.

parameters.name: shipmentPickUpRequest
parameters.description: Details of shipment pick up request.

post.description: This method gets the unencrypted secrets related to the job.

200.description: List of unencrypted credentials of the job.

accountConnectionString.description: Connection string of the account endpoint to use the account as a storage endpoint on the device.

shareCredentialDetails.description: Per share level unencrypted access credentials.

AddressValidationOutput.description: Output of the address validation api.

values.description: Address provided is invalid or not supported.
Address provided is ambiguous, please choose one of the alternate addresses returned.

ApplianceNetworkConfiguration.description: The Network Adapter configuration of a DataBox.

ArmBaseObject.description: Base class for all objects under resource.

AvailableSkuRequest.description: The filters for showing the available skus.

country.description: ISO country code. Country for hardware shipment. For codes check: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements

location.description: Location for data transfer. For locations check: https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/SUBSCRIPTIONID/locations?api-version=2018-01-01

skuNames.description: Sku Names to filter for available skus

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of skus.

phone.description: Phone number of the contact person.

phoneExtension.description: Phone extension number of the contact person.

mobile.description: Mobile number of the contact person.

emailList.description: List of Email-ids to be notified about job progress.

notificationPreference.description: Notification preference for a job stage.

CopyLogDetails.description: Details for log generated during copy.

copyLogDetailsType.description: Indicates the type of job details.

storageAccountName.description: Name of the storage account where the data needs to be uploaded.

accountId.description: Id of the account where the data needs to be uploaded.

bytesSentToCloud.description: Amount of data uploaded by the job as of now.

totalBytesToProcess.description: Total amount of data to be processed by the job.

filesProcessed.description: Number of files processed by the job as of now.

totalFilesToProcess.description: Total number of files to be processed by the job.

DataBoxAccountCopyLogDetails.description: Copy log details for a storage account of a DataBox job

DataBoxDiskCopyLogDetails.description: Copy Log Details for a disk

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the disk

bytesCopied.description: Bytes copied during the copy of disk.

percentComplete.description: Indicates the percentage completed for the copy of the disk.

values.description: Data copy failed. No data was copied.
No copy triggered as device was not returned.

preferredDisks.description: User preference on what size disks are needed for the job. The map is from the disk size in TB to the count. Eg. {2,5} means 5 disks of 2 TB size. Key is string but will be checked against an int.

disksAndSizeDetails.description: Contains the map of disk serial number to the disk size being used for the job. Is returned only after the disks are shipped to the customer.

passkey.description: User entered passkey for DataBox Disk job.

DataBoxDiskJobSecrets.description: The secrets related to disk job.

diskSecrets.description: Contains the list of secrets object for that device.

isPasskeyUserDefined.description: Whether passkey was provided by user.

DataBoxHeavyAccountCopyLogDetails.description: Copy log details for a storage account for DataBoxHeavy

DataBoxHeavyJobSecrets.description: The secrets related to a DataBoxHeavy job.

cabinetPodSecrets.description: Contains the list of secret objects for a DataBoxHeavy job.

DataBoxHeavySecret.description: The secrets related to a DataBoxHeavy.

deviceSerialNumber.description: Serial number of the assigned device.

devicePassword.description: Password for out of the box experience on device.

encodedValidationCertPubKey.description: The base 64 encoded public key to authenticate with the device

DataboxJobSecrets.description: The secrets related to a DataBox job.

podSecrets.description: Contains the list of secret objects for a job.

DataBoxSecret.description: The secrets related to a DataBox.

deviceSerialNumber.description: Serial number of the assigned device.

devicePassword.description: Password for out of the box experience on device.

encodedValidationCertPubKey.description: The base 64 encoded public key to authenticate with the device

DestinationAccountDetails.description: Details of the destination of the data

accountId.description: Arm Id of the destination where the data has to be moved.

DestinationManagedDiskDetails.description: Details for the destination compute disks.

resourceGroupId.description: Destination Resource Group Id where the Compute disks should be created.

stagingStorageAccountId.description: Arm Id of the storage account that can be used to copy the vhd for staging.

DestinationStorageAccountDetails.description: Details for the destination storage account.

DestinationToServiceLocationMap.description: Map of destination location to service location

DiskSecret.description: Contains all the secrets of a Disk.

diskSerialNumber.description: Serial number of the assigned disk.

bitLockerKey.description: Bit Locker key of the disk which can be used to unlock the disk to copy data.

Error.description: Top level error for the job.

code.description: Error code that can be used to programmatically identify the error.

message.description: Describes the error in detail and provides debugging information.

expectedDataSizeInTeraBytes.description: The expected size of the data, which needs to be transferred in this job, in terabytes.

jobStages.description: List of stages that run in the job.

contactDetails.description: Contact details for notification and shipping.

errorDetails.description: Error details for failure. This is optional.

jobDetailsType.description: Indicates the type of job details.

reverseShipmentLabelSasKey.description: Shared access key to download the return shipment label

chainOfCustodySasKey.description: Shared access key to download the chain of custody logs

JobErrorDetails.description: Job Error Details for providing the information and recommended action.

exceptionMessage.description: Contains the non localized exception message

isCancellable.description: Describes whether the job is cancellable or not.

isDeletable.description: Describes whether the job is deletable or not.

isShippingAddressEditable.description: Describes whether the shipping address is editable or not.

status.description: Name of the stage which is in progress.

values.description: A device has been prepared for the order.
Device has been dispatched to the user of the order.
Device has been delivered to the user of the order.
Device has been picked up from user and in transit to azure datacenter.
Device has been received at azure datacenter from the user.
Data copy from the device at azure datacenter.
Order has failed due to issue reported by user.
Order has failed due to issue detected at azure datacenter.

startTime.description: Time at which the job was started in UTC ISO 8601 format.

error.description: Top level error for the job.

details.description: Details of a job run. This field will only be sent for expand details filter.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of job resources.

properties.description: Properties of a job to be updated.

tags.description: The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups).

JobSecrets.description: The base class for the secrets

jobSecretsType.description: Used to indicate what type of job secrets object.

values.description: A device has been prepared for the order.
Device has been dispatched to the user of the order.
Device has been delivered to the user of the order.
Device has been picked up from user and in transit to azure datacenter.
Device has been received at azure datacenter from the user.
Data copy from the device at azure datacenter.
Order has failed due to issue reported by user.
Order has failed due to issue detected at azure datacenter.

displayName.description: Display name of the job stage.

stageTime.description: Time for the job stage in UTC ISO 8601 format.

NotificationPreference.description: Notification preference for a job stage.

values.description: Notification at device picked up from user stage.
Notification at device received at azure datacenter stage.
Notification at data copy started stage.

origin.description: Origin of the operation. Can be : user|system|user,system

operation.description: Localized name of the operation for display purpose.

description.description: Localized description of the operation for display purpose.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of operations.

trackingUrl.description: Url where shipment can be tracked.

location.description: The location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical region is specified on update the request will succeed.

tags.description: The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups).

ShareCredentialDetails.description: Credential details of the shares in account.

supportedAccessProtocols.description: Access protocols supported on the device.

startTime.description: Minimum date after which the pick up should commence, this must be in local time of pick up area.

endTime.description: Maximum date before which the pick up should commence, this must be in local time of pick up area.

shipmentLocation.description: Shipment Location in the pickup place. Eg.front desk

confirmationNumber.description: Confirmation number for the pick up request.

readyByTime.description: Time by which shipment should be ready for pick up, this is in local time of pick up area.

ShippingAddress.description: Shipping address where customer wishes to receive the device.

stateOrProvince.description: Name of the State or Province.

displayName.description: The display name of the sku.

SkuCost.description: Describes metadata for retrieving price info.

enabled.description: The sku is enabled or not.

destinationToServiceLocationMap.description: The map of destination location to service location.

apiVersions.description: Api versions that support this Sku.

disabledReason.description: Reason why the Sku is disabled.

values.description: SKU is not available in the requested country.
SKU is not available to push data to the requested Azure region.
Required features are not enabled for the SKU.
Subscription does not have required offer types for the SKU.
Subscription has not registered to Microsoft.DataBox and Service does not have the subscription notification.

disabledReasonMessage.description: Message for why the Sku is disabled.

requiredFeature.description: Required feature to access the sku.

UnencryptedCredentialsList.description: List of unencrypted credentials for accessing device.

nextLink.description: Link for the next set of unencrypted credentials.

contactDetails.description: Contact details for notification and shipping.

details.description: Details of a job to be updated.

ValidateAddress.description: The requirements to validate customer address where the device needs to be shipped.

deviceType.description: Device type to be used for the job.

jobNameParameter.name: jobName
jobNameParameter.description: The name of the job Resource within the specified resource group. job names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only
